moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Haru
characters.description: originally forbidden from Earthbending, passionate and kind, daddy's boy

moves.name: Boulder Drop
moves.description: Haru molds a large boulder from the earth and drops it atop his opponent's body

moves.name: Earth Crack
moves.description: Haru cracks the earth beneath his opponent, causing misstep and maybe a broken ankle

moves.name: Teenage Charm
moves.description: Haru shows his nice guy side that makes his opponent pause

moves.name: Hidden Talent
moves.description: Haru displays his hidden earthbending, stronger than ever due to supression

new moves.name: Earth Crack
new moves.description: Aang cracks the earth beneath his opponent, causing misstep and maybe a broken ankle
